statements: SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignData;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, recipient_count FROM EmailCampaignData;
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE campaign_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM EmailCampaignData ORDER BY open_rate DESC, click_through_rate ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE recipient_count > 100 ORDER BY campaign_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE open_rate > 0.1 AND click_through_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY recipient_count ASC
SELECT campaign_name, recipient_count FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE campaign_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE open_rate >= 0.2 AND click_through_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY open_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM EmailCampaignData WHERE click_through_rate > open_rate AND recipient_count < 500 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, click_rate FROM campaigns WHERE total_recipients > 1000 ORDER BY click_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE total_recipients BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT campaign_name, response_type, response_date FROM campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.recipient_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_recipients ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate, click_rate FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate FROM campaigns WHERE click_rate > 0.2 ORDER BY total_recipients DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY response_count DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.response_type, cr.response_date FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.response_type = 'positive' ORDER BY cr.response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaigns
SELECT response_id, campaign_id, recipient_email, response_date, response_type FROM email_responses
SELECT campaign_id, total_responses, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM campaign_results
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY open_rate DESC, click_rate ASC;
SELECT c.campaign_id, c.total_responses, cr.revenue_generated FROM campaign_results cr INNER JOIN email_campaigns c ON cr.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE cr.revenue_generated > 1000;
SELECT cr.result_id, er.response_type FROM campaign_results cr LEFT JOIN email_responses er ON cr.campaign_id = er.campaign_id WHERE er.response_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY cr.total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_count FROM campaigns WHERE recipient_count > 1000;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, open_status FROM emails WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_type, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM email_responses GROUP BY response_type;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, recipient_count, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM campaigns WHERE recipient_count > 1000 AND open_rate > 0.2
SELECT emails.recipient_email, emails.delivery_date, email_responses.response_type FROM emails INNER JOIN email_responses ON emails.email_id = email_responses.email_id
SELECT campaign_name, recipient_count, open_rate FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND click_through_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY recipient_count DESC
SELECT e1.recipient_email, e1.delivery_date, e2.response_type FROM emails e1 INNER JOIN email_responses e2 ON e1.email_id = e2.email_id AND e1.delivery_date < e2.response_date
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT recipient_id, email_address, full_name FROM email_recipients ORDER BY subscribed_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, count(click_id) AS total_clicks FROM email_clicks GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate FROM email_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT full_name, subscribed_date, unsubscribe_date FROM email_recipients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT click_timestamp, clicked_url FROM email_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, open_timestamp FROM email_opens WHERE recipient_id = 10 ORDER BY open_timestamp ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_metrics WHERE open_rate > 0.2 AND click_rate > 0.1;
